The Quranic researcher, I swear by what you see and what you do not see, the words may be presented in, so I do not swear by the case And the absences, and it rejects the saying of Qutdah, is general in all its creatures, glory and glory.Attaa (you see) said of the effects of ability and what you do not see from the secrets of ability.It was said the bodies, the souls, the world and the hereafter were said, and it was said by mankind, heaven and angels, and the creation was said and the creator.A fighter said that Al -Walad said: Muhammad is a wizard, and the father of ignorance said a poet, and he said: The priest of God, so God Almighty, upon them, said that he did not.
